tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnergyUsageData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL,
  energy_produced DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  energy_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_production (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  energy_source VARCHAR(50),
  energy_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE optimization_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  optimization_type VARCHAR(50),
  optimization_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    location VARCHAR,
    temperature DOUBLE,
    humidity DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE NOT NULL, 
    energy_usage DECIMAL NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE RenewableEnergyProduction ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE NOT NULL, 
    energy_production DECIMAL NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE NOT NULL, 
    temperature DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
    humidity DECIMAL NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE EnergySources ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    source_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyUsagePatterns ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE NOT NULL, 
    peak_usage DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
    off_peak_usage DECIMAL NOT NULL 
)
